properties.Title: Laser Site Protection
properties.UserDescription: To prevent citizens claiming and building on the site that have been marked for the Laser Towers to be built.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Title: Tree Felled Tax
properties.UserDescription: Tax 5 Euroes when a tree is felled.

Left.contextDescription: A value of 100 represents a fully grown tree, 0 represents a newly-planted seed.

properties.Title: Tree Stump Removal Incentive
properties.UserDescription: Pay 5 Euroes when a Stump is destroyed

properties.Title: Tree Debris Cleanup Incentive
properties.UserDescription: Pays 0.05 Euroes when Tree Debris is cleaned up

properties.Title: Protect Laser Pickup
properties.UserDescription: Protect Lasers being placed or picked up from anybody except PM or GM

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.
